items.sentence: It doesn\'t matter what excuse he gives me, I can\'t forgive him.
You must\'ve been surprised to meet your teacher in such a place.
What Tom really wanted was enough money to buy Mary some flowers.
I hope Tom isn\'t doing something he isn\'t supposed to be doing.
I hope that you\'re the one who\'s going to be doing the driving.
Tom found a phone in the classroom after everybody else had left.
We found out recently that some foxes live here on this mountain.
When I arrived at the station, the train was just about to leave.
When I got out of jail, I wanted to patch things up with my wife.
I feel completely refreshed after spending a week in the country.
